attributes.action: To force petrolium companies to reduce the disparity in prices between diesel and petrol to help transport costs and therefore bring down food costs and inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petrol companies claim that diesel is more expensive than petrol because it is more expensive to produce.  If this is the case then why is diesel cheaper or about the same cost elsewhere in Europe.  Only in rip off Britain does this apply.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
